name: Merman Combat Ultramarine

trigger.text: Add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less to either the top or bottom of their Life area face up.

text: Main: Add up to 1 Character with a cost of 6 or less face up to the top or the bottom of owner's Life area. Trigger: Add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less to either the top or bottom of their Life area face up.

effect.text: Add up to 1 Character with a cost of 6 or less face up to the top or the bottom of owner's Life area.
Add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less to either the top or bottom of their Life area face up.
